MCQ: What is the focus of the workshop on Generative AI at AIMLSystems?
Choices: a: Data collection and processing | b: Developing systems and requisite infrastructure | c: Applications of Generative AI | d: Ethics associated with Generative AI

MCQ: Which of the following is not a topic of interest for the workshop on Generative AI?
Choices: a: Systems, architecture and infrastructure for Generative AI | b: Machine learning and Modeling using LLMs and Diffusion models | c: Natural Language Processing techniques | d: Responsible use of Gen AI

MCQ: What is the main purpose of Gen AI based Plugins and agents?
Choices: a: Data collection and processing | b: Developing systems and requisite infrastructure | c: Enhancing the functionality of Generative AI systems | d: Ensuring fairness and transparency
Correct: Enhancing the functionality of Generative AI systems

MCQ: Which type of models are evaluated in the workshop?
Choices: a: Language and Diffusion based models | b: Image and Video based models | c: Generative Adversarial Networks | d: Reinforcement Learning models

MCQ: What aspect of Generative AI is covered in the ethics section of the workshop?
Choices: a: Fairness | b: Accuracy | c: Speed | d: Efficiency
